featured.text: During the second Industrial Age, people toiled at unusual hours in mines or factories and often had to get up for work early in the morning.

definition.zh_def: 礦山；採礦場；挖掘（或開採）資源的地方
definition.en_def: A place where minerals or other resources are extracted from the earth.
definition.example: The workers went deep into the mine to extract coal.
